attacks.name: Bubblebeam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Fairy Power
attacks.effect: Return 1 of your Pokémon and all cards attached to it to your hand.

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Triple Kick
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Close Combat
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to Hitmontop by attacks is increased by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Mass Attack
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage times the number of Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent’s).

attacks.name: Leaf Guard
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to Jumpluff by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Roast Reveal
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Fire Energy card from your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards. This power can’t be used if Ninetales is affected by a Special Condition.

abilities.name: Night Sight
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card. This power can’t be used if Noctowl is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Extrasensory
attacks.effect: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Muddy Water
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Iron Tail
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy attached to Raichu.

attacks.name: Poison Jab
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

abilities.name: Second Sight
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 3 cards of either player’s deck and put them back on top of that player’s deck in any order. This power can’t be used if Slowking is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Double Return
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage times the number of damage counters on Wobbuffet.

attacks.name: Acceleration Bolt

attacks.name: Thunder
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Ampharos does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Leech Life

attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.effect: Remove 3 damage counters from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Sweet Sleeping Face

attacks.name: Eeeeeeek

attacks.name: Playground
attacks.effect: Each player may search his or her deck for as many Basic Pokémon as he or she likes, put them onto his or her Bench, and shuffle his or her deck afterward. (You put your Pokémon on the Bench first.) Pichu is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Cosmic Cyclone
attacks.effect: Choose as many Water Energy attached to your Pokémon as you like. This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy you chose. Shuffle those cards back into your deck.

abilities.name: RETURN
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Unown from your hand onto your Bench, you may return all Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to your hand.

abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Unown from your hand onto your Bench, you may look at the top 5 cards of your deck and put them back on top of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Copycat
cards.effect: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw a number of cards equal to the number of cards in your opponent’s hand.

cards.name: Energy Switch
cards.effect: Move a basic Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

cards.name: Fisherman
cards.effect: Search your discard pile for 4 basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand.

cards.name: Full Heal
cards.effect: Remove all Special Conditions from your Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Moomoo Milk
cards.effect: Choose 1 of your Pokémon. Flip 2 coins. For each heads, remove 3 damage counters from that Pokémon.

cards.name: Poké Ball
cards.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Pokégear3.0
cards.effect: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. Choose a Supporter card you find there, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

cards.name: Pokémon Collector
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 3 Basic Pokémon, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Pokémon Communication
cards.effect: Choose 1 Pokémon in your hand, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck. If you do, search your deck for a Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Pokémon Reversal
cards.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon and switch it with your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Professor Elm’s Training Method
cards.effect: Search your deck for an Evolution card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Professor Oak’s New Theory
cards.effect: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 6 cards.

cards.name: Switch
cards.effect: Switch 1 of your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Conductivity
abilities.effect: Whenever your opponent attaches an Energy card from his or her hand to 1 of his or her Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Lightning Crush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage. If tails, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Blissful Nurse
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you play Blissey from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may remove all damage counters from all of your Pokémon. If you do, discard all Energy attached to those Pokémon that had any damage counters on them.

abilities.name: Exoskeleton
abilities.effect: Any damage done to Donphan by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Rain Dance
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Water Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Water Pokémon. This power can’t be used if Feraligatr is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hydro Crunch
attacks.effect: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Leaf Trans
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Grass Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon. This power can’t be used if Meganium is affected by a Special Condition.

abilities.name: Afterburner
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for a Fire Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. If you do, put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon. This power can’t be used if Typhlosion is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Flare Destroy
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy card attached to Typhlosion and discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Sacred Rainbow
abilities.effect: All energy attached to Ho-Oh LEGEND are Fire Energy instead of their usual type.

attacks.name: Bright Wing
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy attached to Ho-Oh LEGEND.

abilities.name: Ocean Grow
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Lugia LEGEND into play, you may look at the top 5 cards of your deck and attach all Energy cards you find there to Lugia LEGEND. Discard the other cards.

attacks.name: Elemental Blast
attacks.effect: Discard a Fire Energy, Water Energy, and Lightning Energy attached to Lugia LEGEND.

attacks.name: Thrash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage. If tails, Gyarados does 20 damage to itself.
